item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump touts new NATO defense commitment as 'big win'
item.description: Trump, speaking at a news conference at the NATO summit in the Netherlands, celebrated allies boosting defense spending.

item.title: Trump says Iran nuclear program 'gone for years,' rejects early Pentagon analysis
item.description: President Donald Trump again claimed "total obliteration" of Iran's nuclear program during the NATO summit in the Netherlands on Wednesday.

item.title: Israel-Iran live updates: Trump again claims 'obliteration' of Iran nuclear sites
